response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and bring substantial value to your business. The product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I am confident it will exceed your expectations. My proposal is to offer you this exceptional item at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require additional information to make a decision. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you throughout the process.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
